location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmits his account disbursements for the Residency for the month of November 1819. Bruce states that since November he has ceased to pay the families of the servants attached to Captain George Forster Sadleir's mission until he receives some authentic accounts from Sadleir.
